snippet: The company ended its contract with the boxer, who described gay people as “worse than animals” in a local television interview.
abstract: Nike ends its advertising contract with Filipino boxer Manny Pacquiao, citing derogatory comments he made about homosexuals.
lead_paragraph: The company ended its contract with the boxer, who described gay people as “worse than animals” in a local television interview.

headline.main: Nike Cuts Ties With Manny Pacquiao
